attributes.action: Assist under 18 year olds with financial resources to find job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If your child drops out of school, FE college or is in a job where they are made redundant, they need to get a job/another job.  This may take some time.  Parents have to meet the cost of keeping the young person.  There should be an available allowance to meet the basic needs of this age range (warmth, food, shelter)as well as assistance to search for jobs/attend interviews.
